name: antsRegistrationSyN
description: This script performs image registration using the SyN transform from the ANTs suite. The user can specify the dimensionality of the images, the fixed and moving images, and the output prefix. It supports various types of transformations and optional parameters such as initial transforms, gradient step size, mask usage, and more.
author: Brian B. Avants, Nick Tustison, and Gang Song

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: Image dimension: 2 or 3 (for 2 or 3-dimensional registration of a single volume)

inputs.name: Fixed Image
inputs.description: Fixed image(s) or source image(s) or reference image(s)

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: A prefix that is prepended to all output files

inputs.name: Number of Threads
inputs.description: Number of threads (default = ITK_GLOBAL_DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_THREADS if defined, otherwise 1)

inputs.name: Initial Transform
inputs.description: Initial transform(s) --- order specified on the command line matters

inputs.name: Transform Type
inputs.description:
Transform type (default = 's'). Options:
 - t: translation (1 stage)
 - r: rigid (1 stage)
 - a: rigid + affine (2 stages)
 - s: rigid + affine + deformable syn (3 stages)
 - sr: rigid + deformable syn (2 stages)
 - so: deformable syn only (1 stage)
 - b: rigid + affine + deformable b-spline syn (3 stages)
 - br: rigid + deformable b-spline syn (2 stages)
 - bo: deformable b-spline syn only (1 stage)

inputs.name: Radius for Cross Correlation Metric
inputs.description: Radius for cross correlation metric used during SyN stage (default = 4)

inputs.name: Spline Distance for Deformable B-spline SyN Transform
inputs.description: Spline distance for deformable B-spline SyN transform (default = 26)

inputs.name: Gradient Step Size for SyN and B-spline SyN
inputs.description: Gradient step size for SyN and B-spline SyN (default = 0.1)

inputs.name: Masks
inputs.description: Mask(s) for the fixed image space, or for the fixed and moving image space in the format 'fixedMask,MovingMask'. Use -x once to specify mask(s) to be used for all stages or use -x for each 'stage' (cf -t option). If no mask is to be used for a particular stage, the keyword 'NULL' should be used in place of file names.

inputs.name: Precision Type
inputs.description:
Precision type (default = 'd'). Options:
 - f: float
 - d: double

inputs.name: Use Histogram Matching
inputs.description:
Use histogram matching (default = 0). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

inputs.name: Use 'Repro' Mode for Exact Reproducibility
inputs.description:
Use 'repro' mode for exact reproducibility of output. Uses GC metric for linear stages and a fixed random seed (default = 0). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

inputs.name: Collapse Output Transforms
inputs.description:
Collapse output transforms (default = 1). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

inputs.name: Random Seed
inputs.description: Fix random seed to an int value
